title: Can i get my account perma muted?
body: Is there a way that someone from riot can perma mute my account? whenever i get in a game i get flamed alot for an off meta shaco top or shaco anywhere tbh. and at some point i just lose it, can someone put a perma mute on my account because id rather not get perma banned and ive spend a little more then 2k on this game.

replies.body: I can't do anything about permanently muting your account, as that would diminish the team aspect of League. If you want to try something new with a champion, a good way to do so is to let everyone know what you'll be doing ahead of time and explain your reasonings. If it's just to have fun, maybe try to avoid ranked as that can get pretty serious and those ranked players really take the meta into account. If you're experimenting with a new playstyle or build, make sure to let your team know that as well. Communication is key on the Rift.
